title: Learning Analytics Dashboard Design and Utilization: A Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding online learning environments, basic data interpretation skills, and instructional design fundamentals
context.additional_context: A process for developing preservice teachers' competency in designing and interpreting learning analytics dashboards applicable to real educational settings, emphasizing collaboration and iterative improvement (DBR) from a sociocultural perspective

learning_goals: Design core metrics of a learning analytics dashboard (e.g., engagement, discussion patterns) in alignment with educational objectives.
Iteratively evaluate and improve the educational utility of the dashboard following Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
Perform real-time educational decision-making using a dashboard interface accessible in smartphone-based environments.
Derive actionable insights for qualitative improvement of discussion-based instruction through learning data visualization.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
